txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Albino fur from the beasts surrounding Sûri-kylä. Deliver the items to Kaleva at the Lossoth capital.
'We will make use of these. Thank you.'
'The beasts often provide us fur and their ears for clothing and mittens. Perhaps they will offer these gifts to you as well.'
A Lossoth, Kaleva, at Sûri-kylä is collecting albino fur at the Lossoth capital.
Deliver the albino fur to Kaleva at Sûri-kylä in Forochel
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver albino fur from the beasts surrounding Sûri-kylä in Forochel. The items are to be delivered to Kaleva at the Lossoth capital.
Wanted: Albino fur from the beasts surrounding Sûri-kylä.
